prompts: Create a Dark/Flying-type Pokemon that combines a menacing look with a stylish hat.
Generate a Pokemon resembling a big crow with a striking blue and red color scheme.
Imagine a Pokemon that embodies the essence of a boss bird, complete with a cape.
Show me a regal-looking avian Pokemon that commands the skies with its presence.
Design a tough-looking Pokemon inspired by a crow, with unique feathers and a powerful stance.
Give me a Pokemon that has a dark, mysterious aura and a flamboyant appearance.
Make a Pokemon that looks like it rules the flock with an air of authority.
